questions.question: Why is Kelly applied last in your workflow?
options: Because size depends on edge estimated from signals
Because Kelly determines which stocks to screen
Because Kelly controls market cap filters
questions.explanation: Sizing is a function of the edge produced by the upstream model.

questions.question: Summarize the pipeline in one sentence.
questions.answer_text: Screen for quality → infer regime & confidence → aggregate signals → size with (fractional) Kelly.
